description: Dashboard for monitoring Wireguard and WireRest API

panels.description: Number of peers currently loaded in the configuration
panels.title: Total Peers

panels.description: The number of IP addresses that new clients can use
panels.title: Free IP's

panels.description: How much data was used by WireGuard clients in 1 minute at a specific time
panels.title: Network used in 1 minute

panels.description: How much data was used by WireGuard clients in 1 hour at a specific time
panels.title: Network used in 1 hour

panels.description: The percent of time spent on Garbage Collection over all CPUs assigned to the JVM process.

targets.expr: sum(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance"}[1m])) by (application, instance) / on(application, instance) system_cpu_count

panels.title: GC Pressure

title: Wireguard + WireRest (JVM)
